participant_1.background:
I'd brag about my knowledge of the Beatles' music and history.
i like to eat.
I'm going to take a break from my work on bitcoins and go hiking in the mountains.
I secretly want to be a professional athlete, but I know my parents would never approve.
i have a missing pinky toe.

participant_2.background:
I am close to my family.
My favorite websites are about 80's music and biographies of authors.
i have 3 brothers.
I like to read fiction to escape from the criticism of my family.
I love the feeling of being free to speak my mind, even if it is not always appropriate.

content.text: Hey! How's it going?
Hey! It's going pretty well, thanks! What about you?
I'm doing alright. I'm just about to go hiking in the mountains for a little while.
That sounds really nice! I love hiking. Where are you going hiking?
I'm going to be hiking in the Rockies. I've always wanted to go hiking there.
That sounds amazing! I've always wanted to go to the Rockies too.
You should definitely go sometime! It's a really beautiful place.
I will! Thanks for the suggestion.
No problem! So, what do you like to do for fun?
I like to read, write, and spend time with my family.
That sounds like a lot of fun. I like to do those things too.
Yeah, they're pretty great. What kind of books do you like to read?
I like to read a lot of different types of books, but I mostly read fiction.
I like to read fiction too. What's your favorite book?
My favorite book is The Great Gatsby.
That's a great book! I've read it a few times.
It's such a classic. I love the characters and the setting.
Yeah, it's really well written.
Yeah, it is. So, what do you like to write?
I like to write stories and poems.
That sounds really cool. I've always wanted to write a book, but I've never had the time.
You should definitely try it sometime! It's really fun.
I might! Thanks for the suggestion.
No problem!
